channel.title: Stash on Bounded-Error Log
channel.description: Recent content in Stash on Bounded-Error Log

item.title: Numbers
item.description: Continuing the porting of stuff from betaveros.stash, and adding more stuff. Mnemonic Here’s my mnemonic table for digits, inspired by an old Martin Gardner column. I wrote from memory the first 132 digits of 2012! correctly at IMO 2012 with this table. I had remembered more, but unfortunately, if I recall correctly, I confused myself over whether I had encoded a 5 or a 2 by the S of “nose”, because this is supposed to be more of a phonetic code than a spelling one — otherwise double letters would be confusing and lots of randomly appearing digraphs would be wasted, because English is weird.
